name: Montrouge Grand Prix
description:
A tiny racing game made as a proof of concept for my Moebius-style hand-drawn renderer.

Very simple game, go through all hoops to complete a lap, three laps total, fastest wins.

Move with arrows key or WASD, and use space to boost (there is no in-game feedback for how the boost works, but you're boosted at 200% speed for 2 seconds, then it takes 5 seconds to recharge).

Cheers
